program22: This was the program for Nettverksdagene 2022
hensikt: Nettverksdagene is a career fair arranged by students from Cybernetics and Robotics at NTNU. The purpose is to give the students a chance at meeting their future employer, gather information about summer internships and get an insight into the working life.
doyour: Does your company want to participate on Nettverksdagene 2025?
ballong: There will be a balloon drop where you can win great prizes!
glassgard: The entire hall will be filled with stands! Here you will have an opportunity to get in touch with many exciting companies.
bedpres: There will be presentations for those who want to learn more about the companies.
submitted: If you got in, you have received a confirmation email
vilbliventeliste: You will be put on a waiting list
participant_not_found: Registration with given e-mail not found
unregistration_failure_unknown: Something went wrong, please contact it@nettverksdagene.no
placeholderAllergies: Enter any allergies or dietary restrictions
registration_success: You are registered! Check your email to see if you got a spot or are on the waiting list.
unregistration_success: You are now unregistered from the event.
stillingsannonser_card_text: Jumpstart your career by applying for a job through Nettverksdagene!
avmelding: Are you sure you want to unregister?
itstime: It is about time something gets done here
nouser: Not a user? Please contact IT
lastpart: Write only the last part of the link (Example: If you write 'telenor', the link will be https'://nettverksdagene.no/stillinger/telenor). If you write an internal link, the advertisement for the job will be linked to a box which contains what you specified below. If you do not write an internal link, the job advertisement will be linked to the regular link (above).
herestilling: Here you can add new job advertisements and they will show up below
sendtoall: Send an email to all participants
medlemgruppe: Members are grouped on the contact page by which team they belong to. Please ensure that all members within the same team have the exact same team name, or else they will be placed in separate categories. Please double-check that everything is correct on the contact page after adding a member.
squarephoto: The picture is automatically centered in a square, without being stretched or cropped. Upload square pictures for the best result.
nettis: Nettverksdagene is a yearly career fair organized by third-year students from Cybernetics and Robotics at NTNU. The goal is to connect students and companies within relevant fields.
inntektene: The income generated by Nettverksdagene will go towards a study tour with relevant content for students from Cybernetics and Robotics. This will create an opportunity for students to see how new technology is developed and used in other countries, and give them insight into how problems are solved in large international companies. Support for Nettverksdagene will therefore provide invaluable knowledge that will help develop the students and make them more valuable for the future.
contactinfo: Here you will find the contact information to join or ask questions about Nettverksdagene 2025.
doyourshow: Does your company wish to participate in Nettverksdagene, or have any questions regarding presentations or stands? Please contact the company group.
genquest: If you have any general questions or are unsure who to contact, you can contact the board directly.
standtext: The hall will be filled with stands! Get in touch with many exciting companies.
programtext: Nettverksdagene will end with a formal dinner at Thon Hotel Prinsen.
bedprestext: There will be multiple presentations for those who would like to learn more about the companies.
ballongslipptext: Win great prizes at the balloon drop when Nettverksdagene opens.
thanksbunntext: We would like to thank Bunnpris for supplying coffee during Nettverksdagene 2023!
thankscoop: A big thanks to Coop Extra!
thankscooptext: We would like to thank Coop Extra for supplying coffee during Nettverksdagene 2023!
glassgårdentext: Meet many exciting companies at their stands in Glassgården
closing_dinner: Nettverksdagene will end with a formal dinner at Thon Hotel Prinsen
bedpres2: There will be presentations for those who want to learn more about the companies.
ball: There will be a balloon drop where you can win great prizes!
programfor: Click here to see the program for Nettverksdagene 2022!
interviews2: Participate in speed interviews with some of this year's companies

questions.question: Where are the Networking days arranged?
questions.answer: The Networking days are arranged in Glassgården at Gamle Elektro.

questions.question: When are companies at their stands?
questions.answer: The stand area is open from 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM on Wednesday and Thursday (January 22nd and 23rd).

questions.question: Who can participate in the NVD events?
questions.answer: Everyone can join the balloon drop and visit the stands. However, company presentations, the banquet, and other events requiring registration are reserved for Cybernetics and Robotics students.

questions.question: Is there coffee at the stands?
questions.answer: There's only one way to find out. ;)

questions.question: What can you win at the balloon drop?
questions.answer: Among other prizes there are gift cards, free lunches and drop-in climbing at Grip to name a few.

questions.question: What can you do during NVD?
questions.answer: Stands, company presentations, and the formal dinner, among other activities.

questions.question: What is the formal dinner and who can participate?
questions.answer: It's a business casual dinner where you'll be able to talk to some of our collaborators. There will be dinner, drinks and entertainment.
